news.Title: [AI Summary] 精材2025年9月合併營收7.68億元，年增10.26%
news.Content: 精材（3374.TWO）於2025年10月9日公告2025年9月合併營收。根據Yahoo奇摩股市報導，精材2025年9月合併營收為新台幣7.68億元，相較於去年同期的6.97億元，年增10.26%。累計2025年1至9月合併營收為新台幣51.73億元，較去年同期的52.52億元，年減1.5%。公告中顯示，9月營收增加金額為7150萬元，累計營收減少金額為7901萬元。市場將持續關注精材後續營運表現及相關產業動態。

news.Title: [AI Summary] Xintec Announces September 2025 Consolidated Revenue of NT$768 Million, Up 10.26% Year-Over-Year
news.Content:
• Xintec announced September 2025 consolidated revenue of NT$768 million, a 10.26% increase year-over-year, potentially signaling positive growth trends.
• Xintec's year-to-date revenue decreased by 1.5% compared to the previous year, which could raise concerns about overall annual performance despite the September growth.
